text: STOP-BANG Questionnaire (Chung et al, 2008]Iz Do you snore loudly Yes/ No (Louder than talking or loud enough to be heard through closed doors) T (tired) Do you often feel tired, Yes/ No fatigued or sleepy during daytime? O (observed) Has anyone observed you | Yes/ No stop breathing during sleep? P (blood pressure) Do you have or are you Yes/ No being treated for high blood pressure? B (body mass index) (BMI) | BMI > 35 kg/m?? Neck circumference > 40 Yes/ No cm?
